title: JI-Rouges
content: Does anyone have JI-Rouges normal font that they could email me - [hoymejt@gmail.com](mailto:hoymejt@gmail.com)
author: hoymejt

comments.content:
Travis, we totally don't condone requests to pirate fonts here.  
I tried to help about a year ago: [http://typophile.com/node/94977](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012205031/http:/typophile.com/node/94977 "http://typophile.com/node/94977")

And I have to wonder, in how many of these cases  
 [http://typophile.com/node/97830](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012205031/http:/typophile.com/node/97830 "http://typophile.com/node/97830")  
 [http://typophile.com/node/97827](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012205031/http:/typophile.com/node/97827 "http://typophile.com/node/97827")  
 [http://typophile.com/node/94603](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012205031/http:/typophile.com/node/94603 "http://typophile.com/node/94603")  
 [http://typophile.com/node/94656](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012205031/http:/typophile.com/node/94656 "http://typophile.com/node/94656")  
did you purchase the font versus pirate it?

hhp
